name: 2 days exploring Jakarta and Bogor (West Java)
description: If you are visiting Jakarta, the important place that you have to visit firstly is National Monument (Monas). Monas is the icon of Jakarta city. Jakarta has a lot of public transportation. One of them is Transjakarta. The guests could visit one place to other places by using Transjakarta. Jakarta has many restaurants which serve delicious food and beverage. If you get bored with the atmosphere of restaurant but you still want to taste delicious food, let's have a lunch or dinner on street vendors. You could still taste delicious food with low-price.
